page.title: 11SHILLINGFORD-ATTITUDES
page.content: THE FARMERS WE VISITED WERE HELPFUL. ONE OF THE FARMERS WAS ABOUT TO HAVE A MOTORWAY PUT STRAIGHT THROUGH HIS BACK GARDEN,BUT HE FOUGHT OFF "THE MEN"AND ITS NOW ABOUT A MILE AWAY. MOST OF THE FARMERS ATTITUDES WERE POSITIVE THEIR SURROUNDINGS. ANOTHER FARMER DID'NT LIKE PEOPLE SHOOTING ON HIS LAND BUT HE COULDNT STOP THEM DOING IT.WHILST ANOTHER FARMER HAD A HUNTING PARTY GOING THROUGH HIS LAND.HE TRIED TO STOP IT BUT HE COULDNT.MOST FARMERS DIDNT OBJECT TO HUNTING ON THEIR LAND.
